definition: To cause someone or something to fall forcefully to the ground or to strike with great force, often resulting in physical injury or damage. This term is commonly used to describe actions during physical altercations or violent encounters.

examples.german: Die Mannschaft wurde im Spiel niedergeschlagen.
examples.english: The team was defeated in the game.
